lead_paragraph: A career and life riddled with contrasts added another Wednesday night when Sonny Vaccaro, who at 67 still describes himself as a renegade, gave a 90-minute speech at the Harvard Law School.
snippet: A career and life riddled with contrasts added another Wednesday night when Sonny Vaccaro, who at 67 still describes himself as a renegade, gave a 90-minute speech at the Harvard Law School.
